title: Dancing Generation
original_name: ダンシング・ゼネレーション
sinopse: Aiko Hagiwara is an average high school student who loves dancing. Although she did classical dance at 10 years old, she's since forgotten about that world. However, one day Aiko goes along with a friend to a dance audition in the N-Y-D-C studio, and she meets the famous jazz dancer Takashi Kanzaki, who is there as a judge. Kanzaki, who's assembling a dance team with members from all over the world, decides to scout Aiko. Aiko's journey to the world of dancing has just begun!
